Through the official Yeedi Amazon storefront, you can pick up the advanced S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop for $499.99 shipped, which has been keeping my floors clear and clean all through 2025 and into the new year, which you can learn more about in my hands-on review here. Down from its full $1,200 price tag, we saw discounts over the last year since its March 2025 release go as low as $520 during Black Friday/Cyber Monday and Christmas sales. Now, you can bring home the same advanced system that has served me well with an even lower price, thanks to the $700 markdown, landing it at a new all-time low price. You can also save a bit more while still getting some advanced autonomous cleaning (not as advanced as the S14 Plus) by going with the M12 Ultra Plus robot that is down at its $339.99 low. There are four main packages that will range from a starting $4,299 rate up to $15,698, and securing a pre-order now gives you a $500 off coupon, a 400W solar panel, a 5-to-8-year extended warranty, and various other savings/accessories. items.title: Save up to $694 on Lectric e-bikes as you upgrade your 2026 commute during its New Year Sale – deals start from $999
items.summary:
With its long-term extended holiday sale having officially come to an end, Lectric has now launched its New Year Sale with up to $694 savings across its lineup. Of course, the biggest deals during this new event are on Lectric’s XPedition 2 Cargo e-bikes, with the standard 13Ah e-bike getting a $346 bundle at $1,399 shipped, while the 26Ah dual-battery e-bike is getting a $545 bundle at $1,799 shipped, and the 35Ah dual-battery long-range e-bike is seeing the $694 bundle at $1,999 shipped. Without the usual savings on the bundles themselves, as is common during Lectric’s sale events, you’d have to pay either $1,745, $2,344, or $2,693 for these same packages at full price. They may not be the largest bundles like we saw during Black Friday and the previous holiday sale events, but you’re still saving a significant amount – up to $693 – while also upgrading to one of America’s most popular cargo-hauling solutions. Head below to check out the full sale’s lineup of deals.

more…

Your afternoon lineup of the best Android game and app deals is now ready to roll, including titles like Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, Dream Town Island, Conquistadorio, Hero of the Kingdom, Water Tracker: Hydro Coach PRO, Tokaido, and more. Just be sure to also scope out the deals we have on Lenovo’s 2025 Tab One with the folio case at just $90, up to $300 off Google Pixel 10/Pro devices, and Samsung’s more affordable Galaxy S25 FE hitting Amazon lows today at $200 off. The apps await below.

items.title: Fintech firm Betterment confirms data breach after hackers send fake crypto scam notification to users
items.summary: Hackers gained access to some Betterment customers’ personal information through a social engineering attack, then targeted some of them with a crypto-related phishing message.

items.title: Complete your Disney Pixar LEGO collections with the Ideas Luxo Jr. that can squish its ball at $63
items.summary:
LEGO Ideas Disney Pixar Luxo Jr. set

Buy for $63 (Reg. $70)

What we love

Your Disney and Pixar LEGO collections cannot be considered finished until you’ve brought home this Luxo Jr. set, which gives you the iconic mascot that’s been seen in various movies since its original appearance in 1986. One completed, it stands 8 inches tall and 6 inches wide – and best of all, it comes with a printed Luxo ball that can even be squished like in the opening credits of Pixar movies!

OMOTON Aluminum MagSafe Tripod, Mount, and Selfie Stick

Buy for $23.50 (Reg. $34)

What we love

This MagSafe accessory truly packs a punch when it comes to its overall versatility. Not only can it function as a tripod, but also an airplay tray mount, a selfie stick, and the list goes on. There are even magnets inside that let you latch it onto gym equipment, golf carts, kitchen appliances and more.

items.title: The UK plans to bring into force a law this week that will make it illegal to create non-consensual intimate images, as Ofcom investigates X (BBC)
items.summary:
BBC:
The UK plans to bring into force a law this week that will make it illegal to create non-consensual intimate images, as Ofcom investigates X  —  The UK will bring into force a law which will make it illegal to create non-consensual intimate images, following widespread concerns over Elon Musk's Grok AI chatbot.

items.title: Start 2026 with greener living using this Govee smart electric kitchen composter at $200, more from $27
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its Upgraded Smart Electric Kitchen Composter back at $199.99 shipped. While this newer, slightly larger model sported a $500 full price when hitting Amazon back in November, though December saw it drop and hold out at $250. Today’s deal is dropping the price even further to upgrade your kitchen with greener means to utilize food scraps, with an additional $50 cut from the tag. We’ve also collected a bunch of the brand’s other smart appliances below for further 2026 home upgrades.

Google says Gemini will help power not only a more personalized version of Siri, but also future Apple Intelligence features  —  Google today announced that its AI platform Gemini will help power not only a more personalized version of Siri, but a range of future Apple Intelligence features.

items.title: A New Jersey lawsuit shows how hard it is to fight deepfake porn
items.summary: A number of US laws have already banned deepfake pornography — most notably the Take It Down Act. But while specific users are clearly breaking those laws, it’s much harder to hold the entire platform accountable.
